getItemFlagId01.Wiki: Event flag that is set on if lotItemId01 is awarded

getItemFlagId.Wiki: Event flag that is set on when this ItemLot is awarded, the ItemLot will not be rolled again if the flag is on

cumulateNumFlagId.Wiki: Flag used to store cumulative drops

cumulateNumMax.Wiki: The maximum amount of times this lot will add to the cumulative number

isProgressOffset.Wiki: Offsets the ItemLot used by 10 based on how many story progress flags are on

enableLuck01.Wiki: Will lotItemId01 be affected by item discovery?

cumulateReset01.Wiki: If enabled, resets the value in cumulateLotPoint01 if lotItemId01 drops

GameClearOffset.Wiki: Offsets the ItemLot id when the player is in NG+

Self.Wiki: Handles item drops, consecutive row ids are grouped together and rolled all at once
